meanings.definition: The most active, committed, or strict members of a group or movement.
meanings.sent1: The hardcore of the book club always read every assigned book.
meanings.sent2: The hardcore fans camped out for days to get tickets to the concert.
meanings.sent3: The hardcore gamers took their virtual battles very seriously.
meanings.sent4: She was the hardcore of the debate team, always ready with a strong argument.
meanings.sent5: The hardcore hikers braved the storm to reach the mountain peak.

meanings.definition: Involving or characterized by explicit sexual content or violence.

meanings.sent2: The hardcore video game was rated for mature players only.
